meanings.definition: Furthest to the right in a group or series.
meanings.sent1: In the game, the rightmost player scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent2: The rightmost house on the street had a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The rightmost cookie in the jar always mysteriously disappears first.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the rightmost star in the sky, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The rightmost path through the forest led to a hidden waterfall.

meanings.definition: Located on the far right side.
meanings.sent1: The rightmost seat in the cinema offered the best view of the screen.
meanings.sent2: She placed the rightmost book back on the shelf where it belonged.
meanings.sent3: The rightmost slice of cake seemed to be winking at me.
meanings.sent4: His words were like the rightmost puzzle piece, completing the picture.
meanings.sent5: The rightmost door in the hallway led to a secret room.
